attributes.action: To debate a vote in no confidence in the Conservative Government.
attributes.additional_details: If you sign this and it reaches 100'000 it would have to get spoken about in Parliament. This would means they would have to vote on their own vote for no confidence. Obviously they will vote against this and because they have a majority they will win, obviously. But! If enough people sign then the government would be going against the people they are here to represent, which is Undemocratic. This means the government has to choose, either relinquish their power or be labelled a Dictatorship.
attributes.background: We're 2 months into this "new" Conservative Government and look at it! We have a petition to get a debate on a vote of no confidence in the Health Secretary and many Solicitors going on strike due to the reduction in Legal Aid introduced by the Justice Secretary.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104544

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
